edited_stories.edited_story_text: Being on the beach drove the dog to a high level of excitement. The curious thing was browsing about, eventually stumbling upon a stick before becoming slightly inebriated. He was so thrilled that he couldn't contain it, but was also fully aware of it. A photograph was taken of a sea creature that was on the beach as a parting memory.
